Name: Subwallet
Notes: Joystream must be enabled as a network manually

Name: Polkagate
Notes: Works - the user must enable “Test networks” in the settings. Would not suggest it though until better support is added.
Can we get added?: We should probably request full support

Name: Ledger Hardware Wallet
Notes: A ledger wallet can currently receive Joystream assets but will not be able to do anything with them. A custom extension has to be created for support.
Can we get added?: Yes, but it requires coding of a custom extension.

Name: Math Wallet
Notes: Has the ability to add custom substrate networks but doesn’t accept the Joystream RPC address
Can we get added?: Yes, have requested marketing WG fill in the form to request adding

Name: Fearless Wallet
Notes: Works, but it doesn’t list Joystream. Mobile wallet untested.

Name: Enkrypt
Can we get added?: Yes, have requested builders WG create a PR as their website asks for
